knimeNode.name: RDKit Fingerprint Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node to read fingerprints from a FPS file into an output table.

fullDescription.intro: This node reads an FPS file with its fingerprint records into a KNIME table. The format of the .fps file is mentioned here: https://jcheminf.springeropen.com/articles/10.1186/1758-2946-5-S1-P36

tab.name: Options
tab.option: The location of the FPS file containing fingerprint records.

option.name: Use IDs from file as row IDs (Requires unique IDs!)

tab.option: Flag to determine, if IDs read from a fingerprint record of the file shall be used as row IDs. This will fail, if the FPS file does not contain unique fingerprint IDs.
